mapper.select: SELECT noticeId , mbrId , ntSbj , ntConts , DATE_FORMAT(frstRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') as frstRegDt , frstRegUser , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice) totalCnt , viewCnt FROM notice order by noticeId desc LIMIT #{rowNum}, #{pagePerRow}
SELECT noticeId , mbrId , ntSbj , ntConts , DATE_FORMAT(frstRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') as frstRegDt , frstRegUser , viewCnt FROM notice WHERE noticeId = #{noticeId}
SELECT noticeId , mbrId , ntSbj , ntConts , DATE_FORMAT(frstRegDt, '%m/%d') as frstRegDt , frstRegUser FROM notice order by noticeId desc LIMIT 0, #{endNum}
